meanings.sent1: I enjoy rereading my favorite book every summer.
meanings.sent2: She is rereading her notes before the exam.
meanings.sent3: The cat keeps rereading the same page of the newspaper.
meanings.sent4: His mind kept rereading the words long after he closed the book.
meanings.sent5: Rereading the story made the characters come alive in her mind.

meanings.definition: The act of reading something again.
meanings.sent1: Her rereading of the letter brought back memories of their friendship.
meanings.sent2: The teacher noticed his students' rereading of the textbook for the third time.
meanings.sent3: The rereading of the recipe made her realize she forgot an ingredient.
meanings.sent4: The rereading of the old journal felt like revisiting the past.
meanings.sent5: The rereading of the poem revealed new meanings each time.
